data.title: Guns in Movies, TV and Video Games
data.text:
Inception

Cinema Poster

Country United States

United Kingdom Directed by Christopher Nolan Release Date 2010 Language English

Japanese

French Studio Warner Bros.

Syncopy Distributor Warner Bros.

Main Cast Character Actor Dom Cobb Leonardo DiCaprio Arthur Joseph Gordon-Levitt Ariadne Elliot Page Eames Tom Hardy Mr. Saito Ken Watanabe Yusuf Dileep Rao Robert Michael Fisher Cillian Murphy Mallorie "Mal" Cobb Marion Cotillard Professor Stephen Miles Michael Caine Peter Browning Tom Berenger

Inception is a 2010 science fiction thriller from director Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight) and stars Leonardo DiCaprio as Cobb, a specialist in infiltrating people's minds through their dreams and stealing their deepest secrets. The cast included Michael Caine, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Tom Hardy, Marion Cotillard, and Elliot Page.

The following weapons were used in the film Inception:

WARNING! THIS PAGE CONTAINS SPOILERS!

Handguns

Beretta Px4 Storm

Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) carries a Beretta Px4 Storm with a threaded barrel as his sidearm throughout the film. He is also seen using it with a suppressor.

Beretta 92FS

The Beretta 92FS is used by several of the men chasing Cobb in the opening dream as well as during the chase in Mombasa. The men of Fischer's militarized subconscious who attack Arthur in the second level dream also use the Beretta. Arthur is then seen with the Beretta.

Beretta 92SB

Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) takes a Beretta 92SB from a subconscious security guard in the hotel room dream. Later he gives the pistol to Robert Fischer (Cillian Murphy).

SIG-Sauer P232

A SIG-Sauer P232 is used by Mal (Marion Cotillard) to injure Arthur during the opening dream. She also appears to use it briefly in the third dream level.

Walther PPK

Saito (Ken Watanabe) is seen pulling a Walther PPK when he awakes from the opening dream. Later Cobb is seen holding it.

Glock 17

A Glock 17 is used by Arthur (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) in the first and second dream levels. A subconscious guard chasing Cobb's team on a highway bridge is also seen firing a Glock.

Heckler & Koch P2000

Eames (Tom Hardy) carries the Heckler & Koch P2000 during the downtown dream. It is seen quite clearly in a close-up, at the warehouse.

Behind the Scenes

Browning BDM

A Browning BDM is pulled by Saito in the first level (Downtown). In a few shots in the third dream level, he is seen holding one.

Vektor CP1

A black Vektor CP1 is used by Saito in the third dream level (Fischer's Winter Fortress). Oddly, he is seen holding his Browning BDM in a few shots before Eames hands him the CP1.

SIG-Sauer P226

A SIG-Sauer P226 is used by Fischer in the third dream level (Fischer's Winter Fortress).

Smith & Wesson Model 19

One of the men on the motorcycles that chases Cobb's team is armed with a Smith & Wesson Model 19.

SIG-Sauer P239

Yusuf (Dileep Rao) uses a SIG-Sauer P239 with a stainless slide while shooting it out on the bridge.

SIG-Sauer P228

SIG-Sauer P228s are used by some of the Cobol Engineering guards chasing Cobb in Mombasa.

Unknown 1911 Variant

One of Saito's bodyguards offers Cobb his pistol to deal with Nash (Lukas Haas) after he sells them out. While the pistol can not be seen clearly, it appears to be a 1911 variant with Pachmayr grips.

Shotguns

Sawed-Off Double Barreled Shotgun

One of Fischer's subconscious guards aboard a motorcycle chasing Cobb's team carries a Sawed-Off Double Barrel Shotgun.

Submachine Guns

Heckler & Koch MP5A3

Heckler & Koch MP5A3s in various configurations are used by Fischer's subconcious private security guards, particularly in the winter scene.

Behind the Scenes

Heckler & Koch MP5A2

A few of Fischer's subconscious guards are seen with Heckler & Koch MP5A2s.

‎

Rifles

L1A1

A Japanese security guard (Tohoru Masamune) in the film's opening carries an L1A1 rifle with wooden handguards. The L1A1 is probably substituting for a Howa Type 64, which is illegal to own and export outside Japan.

M4A1 Carbine

Various Fischer's subconscious private security men or "dream mercenaries" are armed with M4A1 Carbines.

Behind the Scenes

FN SCAR-L

The FN SCAR-L with an ACOG scope is used by Arthur (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) to eliminate some of Fischer's dream snipers before he is interrupted by Eames (Tom Hardy).

SIG SG 552

A winter camouflaged SIG SG 552 is used by Eames during the third level (Winter Fortress). Its stock and handguard are wrapped in cloth, and it appears to have a rail on the top of the receiver.

Behind the Scenes

Norinco QBZ-97

In the third level (Winter Fortress), a guard is briefly seen with a Norinco QBZ-97 rifle.

Sniper Rifles

Blaser R93 LRS2 Precision Sniper Rifle

A winterized Blaser R93 LRS2 Precision Sniper Rifle with a suppressor is used by Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio) in Fischer's Winter Fortress dream.

Heckler & Koch G3SG/1

Fischer's subconscious sniper is seen attacking Cobb's team with a Heckler & Koch G3SG/1 and later folds out the bipod before being shot down by Arthur's FN SCAR-L.

Machine Guns

M240B

A guard aboard a Humvee fires a mounted M240B while chasing Eames in the Winter Fortress dream before getting wiped out by Eames' bomb.

Others

Milkor MGL Mk 1L

A Milkor MGL Mk 1L (MGL-140) with black finish is used by Eames (Tom Hardy) to take out the last warehouse attacker in the first level (City).

Heckler & Koch P2A1

A Heckler & Koch P2A1 Flare Pistol is used by Eames to draw the guards away from the fortress in the third level (Winter Fortress).

M26 Hand Grenade
